thread.title: Burr: Senate Panel Won’t Investigate Possible Contacts Between Russia, Trump Campaign
thread.title_full: Burr: Senate Panel Won’t Investigate Possible Contacts Between Russia, Trump Campaign - Washington Wire - WSJ

author: Siobhan Hughes
title: Burr: Senate Panel Won’t Investigate Possible Contacts Between Russia, Trump Campaign
text: Senate Intelligence Committee Chairman Richard Burr said on Thursday that his committee’s probe into Russian hacking during the elections wouldn’t look into possible contacts between Russians and Donald Trump’s presidential campaign, saying that such questions weren’t appropriate for his panel. “That’s not our role,” the North Carolina Republican told reporters. “We don’t have any authority   President Obama Surprises Joe Biden With Medal of Freedom
